author: Lauren Watson
title: Retired Marine and cancer survivor celebrates remission with 10-hour swim
text: COLORADO SPRINGS, Colo. ( KKTV /Gray News) - A retired Marine and cancer survivor in Colorado celebrates the anniversary of his remission with a feat he picked up during his service. Michael LaBarge said he was diagnosed with glioblastoma multiforme, grade IV brain cancer, 21 years ago on April 2. LaBarge said he has been in remission for a while and that he swims for 10 hours on the anniversary to celebrate it. “The prognosis was two weeks to 10 months … 21 years ago,” he told KKTV . “I did this a lot in the Marines. [Today,] I started at 6 a.m., stopping at 4 p.m.” He completed his swim this year at the U.S. Air Force Academy’s Community Pool in Colorado Springs. Chris Gesterling, the USAFA Pool Aquatics Manager, said he often sees LaBarge at the pool, and his story of surviving cancer is inspiring. “Former Marine ... you know, he beat brain cancer so everything is possible for him,” Gesterling said. As LaBarge swam, he also shared his message for those fighting similar battles to the one he faced. “Hopefully, this will inspire people with cancer to get out, stay active and, you know, don’t get too down on themselves,” he said. Copyright 2024 KKTV via Gray Media Group, Inc. All rights reserved.

author: Yulia Bonilla
title: Rocío Nahle presenta denuncia ante FGR por daño moral y acoso en su contra
text: Informa en evento donde acompañó a Sheinbaum Rocío Nahle presenta denuncia ante FGR por daño moral y acoso en su contra La candidata a la gubernatura de Veracruz presentó una denuncia ante la FGR por varios delitos, a raíz de las diversas acusaciones en las que se le señala de enriquecimiento ilícito y otras presuntas faltas La candidata a la gubernatura de Veracruz por Morena, PT y PVEM, [Rocío Nahle](https://www.razon.com.mx/mexico/piden-nahle-justicia-mitin-lerdo-tejada-572112), presentó una denuncia ante la Fiscalía General de la República por varios delitos, a raíz de las diversas acusaciones en las que se le señala de enriquecimiento ilícito y otras presuntas faltas. Esto lo dio a conocer al acompañar a la candidata presidencial Claudia Sheinbaum en conferencia desde Veracruz, en donde negó que su equipo se transporte en unidades robadas, como lo señaló un periódico de circulación nacional. “Como son todos los días y es una tercera persona que ni conozco pero quien sale a decir tantas cosas, el día de hoy estoy presentando una denuncia en la Fiscalía General de la República (aplausos) por difamación, daño moral, falsificación de documentos, falsificaron unos documentos y unas cuentas en el extranjero que no tengo, que no son y por daños también a terceros y acoso a mi persona y acoso a terceras personas, esto ya brincó pero es lo que yo tengo que hacer, somos muy ocupados en nuestra campaña y preparando lo que es nuestro gobierno porque vamos a ganar aquí en Veracruz”, dijo. La exsecretaria de energía dijo que este tipo de acusaciones contra ella las recibe a diario producto del periodo electoral, pues dijo que la oposición reacciona a que ella encabeza las preferencias entre las y los veracruzanos. “Es un golpeteo, estamos en una elección y pues imagínense que yo todos los días tenga que estar saliendo a desmentir cuando yo tengo giras de tres, cuatro municipios que visitar, ya llevo 160”, comentó. [Únete a nuestro canal de WhatsApp. ](https://www.whatsapp.com/channel/0029Va4honc30LKY9Z0wAT1u)En La Razón enviamos a tu celular lo más importante México y el Mundo, recuerda que una persona informada siempre tiene La Razón. FGR - [Hacienda, tomando el control financiero de Pemex](/opinion/columnas/mauricio-flores/hacienda-tomando-control-financiero-pemex-575965) - [¿Quién es la esposa de Toni Kroos y a qué se dedica?](/deportes/quien-es-la-esposa-toni-kroos-jessica-kroos-a-que-se-dedica-real-madrid-retiro-577510) - [Aumentan 96% mensajes de odio en redes en actual proceso electoral](/mexico/aumentan-96-mensajes-odio-redes-actual-proceso-electoral-577505) - [Novio de Mía Rubín le obsequia a la joven un caballo por su primer año como novios | VIDEO](/entretenimiento/novio-mia-rubin-le-obsequia-joven-caballo-primer-ano-novios-video-577453) - [Critican a Ingrid Coronado por sonreír en la transmisión de la muerte de Verónica Toussaint](/entretenimiento/critican-ingrid-coronado-sonreir-transmision-muerte-veronica-toussaint-577193)

author: @12OnYourSide
title: Police in Maine cancel Amber Alert after locating abducted mother, child
text: Police in Maine cancel Amber Alert after locating abducted mother, child SACO, Maine ( [WABI](https://www.wabi.tv/2023/12/29/amber-alert-issued-mother-child-abducted-saco/)/Gray News) - Authorities in Maine say the Amber Alert that was issued at the request of the Saco Police Department for an abducted mother and her child has been canceled. The two were safely located, Maine State Police [said](https://www.facebook.com/MaineSP/posts/pfbid02QaNTABJdYjdFpBmwjV3jagqegazMA797LBi69vyYQiNbx3AaxZ2APSbeK7auvUd4l) early Friday morning. Police say the two, who were residing in the Biddeford area, were initially forced into a white Ford Explorer with New York registration by a male suspect around 11:30 a.m. on Thursday. They say at 3:41 p.m., the vehicle crossed the tolls into New York state. Maine State Police did not immediately provide information about the male suspect’s location after the Amber Alert was canceled. If you have any information, please contact the Saco Police Department at 207-284-4535. Copyright 2023 WABI Gray Media Group, Inc. All rights reserved.

author: Marissa Blackwood
title: Gypsy Rose Blanchard to Produce Lifetime Docuseries After Prison Release
text:
The Act’s Gypsy Rose Blanchard is Making a Lifetime Docuseries
Gypsy Rose Blanchard, the true crime figure whose story captivated audiences in the documentary Mommy Dead and Dearest and Hulu’s dramatic adaptation The Act, is now the subject of a new docuseries on Lifetime. Blanchard, who was recently released from prison after serving eight years for her role in her mother’s death, continues to be a compelling figure in the true crime genre.
Gypsy Rose Blanchard’s Release from Prison
After serving eight years in prison for her involvement in her mother’s death, Gypsy Rose Blanchard has been released. Her story, which was previously chronicled in the documentary Mommy Dead and Dearest and Hulu’s The Act, continues to captivate audiences as she re-enters society.
Impact on Popular Culture
Gypsy Rose Blanchard’s story has had a significant impact on popular culture, with the success of the documentary Mommy Dead and Dearest and Hulu’s The Act. The new docuseries on Lifetime further demonstrates the enduring fascination with Blanchard’s experiences and the public’s desire to understand the complexities of her story.
New Docuseries on Lifetime
Lifetime’s upcoming docuseries will provide a deeper exploration of Gypsy Rose Blanchard’s life and experiences, shedding new light on the events that led to her imprisonment and her subsequent release. The series promises to offer a comprehensive and nuanced portrayal of Blanchard’s story, allowing audiences to gain a deeper understanding of her journey.
